root.name: The Simpsons Cartoon Studio
root.description: Not so much a game as an interactive playset, the Simpsons Cartoon Studio is packed with resources from the show for users to create their own short cartoons to share with friends or save to disc. Â It contains a total of seventeen characters, some of which have more than one animation loop, as well as fifty special effects, thirty-five backdrops and several hundred props, all from the TV show. Though far less sophisticated than most animation studio software, including Flash, it can still be fairly complex for animation novices until they've spent some time exploring the options available.
